title: Where in the World?
description: A suspicious login attempt was detected from IP address '175.144.81.121'. Your job is to identify which country this IP address is registered to. Use a free IP lookup tool to find the country code (e.g., 'US' for United States, 'GB' for United Kingdom).
hints: Try searching for 'IP lookup tool' or 'IP geolocation' in your browser.
Websites like ipinfo.io or iplocation.net can help you find this information.
The flag format is FLAG{COUNTRYCODE} where COUNTRYCODE is the two-letter code.
